author: Xbox
description:
Halo: Campaign Evolved – a faithful yet modernized remake of the Halo: Combat Evolved campaign – is coming to Xbox Series X|S and PC in 2026. In this developer roundtable, the Halo Studios team shares insights on the overall vision and some of the new enhancements and features being added to this timeless classic. 

Experience the original story rebuilt with high-definition visuals, updated cinematics, and refined controls, plus three brand-new prequel missions featuring the Master Chief and Sgt. Johnson. A broader arsenal of weapons, vehicles, enemies, and gameplay-modifying “Skulls” – optional modifiers that change combat in fun and challenging ways – add fresh tactics and endless replayability. 

Play it your way: solo, 2-player splitscreen co-op on console, or up to 4-player online co-op on console and PC with full crossplay and cross-progression support.  Whether you’re discovering Halo for the first time or returning to the ring after 25 years, Halo: Campaign Evolved delivers an
title: Halo: Campaign Evolved | Roundtable Reveal

author: Xbox
description:
Step into the fight with Halo: Campaign Evolved.

The Covenant believe the Silent Cartographer lies hidden beneath this island — a key that could unlock the secrets of Halo itself. Your mission: locate the map room and uncover the path to the ring’s control center.

Halo: Campaign Evolved, coming to Xbox Series X|S and PC 2026, is a faithful yet modernized remake of Halo: Combat Evolved’s campaign, rebuilt from the ground up with high-definition visuals, refined controls, 2-player splitscreen co-op on console, up to 4-player online co-op on console and pc, 3 new missions, an expanded arsenal of weapons, vehicles, new enemies, and more. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/halo-campaign-evolved

Play Day One on Game Pass or Wishlist now on Xbox

description:
Introducing...No Man's Sky Breach

Uncover the tragic fate of the lost Fireship Arcadia corvette ship in No Man's Sky's all-new "Breach" update. Free to existing players.

Journey through the purple-star solar systems and experience the spookier side of the No Man's Sky universe.

Salvage the wreck of the mysterious corvette and earn exclusive ship parts to use in your own ship creations.

author: Xbox
description:
The deep keeps its secrets, and its dead...

Launching on October 28th on Xbox Series X|S - celebrate the launch of Beneath with a launch trailer that is a love letter to the golden age of shooters and 2000's vibes. 

Beneath is a Lovecraft-inspired survival FPS built by two brothers. Scarce ammo, merciless enemies and a sense of the unknown combine in a 10+ hour, story-driven single player campaign, built for both veteran gamers and those seeking an old school experience 

Seasoned diver Noah Quinn’s routine expedition plunges him into chaos, trapping him in the depths of the ocean, where an ancient evil lurks. As supplies dwindle and nightmarish creatures close in, Noah must confront horrifying mutations and unravel a sinister conspiracy that threatens humanity itself. With his daughter’s life hanging in the balance, Noah is pushed to his limits in a desperate race against time. Can he uncover the truth and stop an ancient horror from surfacing, or will the abyss consume them all?
title: Beneath | Ride Or Die Launch Trailer

The ultimate pick-up-and-play racer where pure arcade thrills meet console! Drift, boost, and dominate across cinematic tracks packed with shortcuts, stunts, and over-the-top missions. author: Xbox
description:
Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2 is coming to Xbox Series X|S in 2026!

You may already know our unwavering Space Marine, Malum Caedo, but a brand-new playable character will also be available in Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2. Pledge your allegiance to the Imperial faith and storm into combat as Sister of Battle, Nyra Veyrath! Everywhere she goes, smouldering ashes are left in her wake as she dispatches the Emperor’s enemies with speed, precision and scores of indiscriminate flames.

author: Xbox
description:
Skinwalker is a hack n' slash pixel platformer. In a desperate bid to save your daughter from a terminal illness, you swear allegiance to a mysterious being held captive in the research centre you work in. In exchange for its freedom, it grants you the ability to shape-shift into a formidable beast, with the promise of a cure. Everything comes at a price. What lengths will you go to, to save your daughter?   

Coming to Xbox 2026.

author: Xbox
description:
The air of Silver Pines is thick with dread. 

On a case to find a missing musician, private investigator Red Walker finds himself in a town that feels... wrong.

Face unspeakable horrors that wait for you in the shadows, find solutions to the puzzles blocking your way. Find Eddie Velvet. Survive.

Silver Pines is a survival horror metroidvania. Coming 2026 to Xbox Series X|S.

The wait is over—Chicken Run: Eggstraction is out now! 🐔

Step back into the world of Chicken Run right where Dawn of the Nugget left off, full of daring missions, tricky challenges and mischievous villains to outsmart.

Play as fan-favorites like Molly, Frizzle, and Fowler
1–2 player co-op, including co-op–only levels
Cutscenes packed with classic Aardman comedy
Sneak, puzzle-solve, and lead your flock to freedom
Available now on Xbox!
